thread.title: Moto G5 Plus to be unveiled on Flipkart today with ‘BuyBack guarantee’; specs, features and how to watch live streaming event
thread.title_full: Moto G5 Plus to be unveiled on Flipkart today with ‘BuyBack guarantee’; specs, features and how to watch live streaming event

author: FE Online
title: Moto G5 Plus to be unveiled on Flipkart today with ‘BuyBack guarantee’; specs, features and how to watch live streaming event
text:
Technology Moto G5 Plus to be unveiled on Flipkart today with ‘BuyBack guarantee’; specs, features and how to watch live streaming event Moto G5 Plus to be unveiled on Flipkart today with ‘BuyBack guarantee’; specs, features and how to watch live streaming event Moto G5 Plus smartphone is all set to be unveiled in India today and will be sold as Flipkart exclusive. The smartphone was launched along with Moto G5 at the Mobile World Congress 2017, held in Barcelona. By: FE Online | Updated: March 15, 2017 11:52 AM Flipkart has announced a BuyBack Guarantee scheme with the Moto G5 Plus smartphone under which the e-commerce platform will buy the phone back at an ‘assured price’ when the consumers want to buy another device on the website. 
Moto G5 Plus smartphone is all set to be unveiled in India today and will be sold as Flipkart exclusive. The smartphone was launched along with Moto G5 at the Mobile World Congress 2017, held in Barcelona. Flipkart meanwhile is trying all out marketing strategies to sell the latest smartphone. It has announced a BuyBack Guarantee scheme with the Moto G5 Plus smartphone under which the e-commerce platform will buy the phone back at an ‘assured price’ when the consumers want to buy another device on the website. 
Motorola has introduced the metal unibody design in the Moto G5 Plus for the first time in the G series. The device also features the popular Google Assistant which was first available only on Google’s Pixel devices. Motorola will live stream the launch event of Moto G5 Plus on its official YouTube page for India. Even Flipkart has released a teaser and a link to the live streaming service to be viewed on its portal as well. 
Moto G5 Plus launch event will start at 12:15 PM, watch it live here: 
Moto G5 Plus features a 5.2-inch FHD display and runs Android Nougat with Motorola’s software integrations over the top. This includes the Moto Display and Moto Actions. The phone has a Snapdragon 625 processor with 2GB/3GB/4GB RAM options based on the region, and 32GB/64GB of internal memory.We will have to wait and watch to know which model is unveiled in India. The Moto G5 Plus has microSD card support as well. 
Moto G5 Plus features a 12MP rear-facing camera with phase detection autofocus (PDAF), 1.4µm pixels, an aperture of f/1.7 and a dual-LED flash. The Moto G5 Plus can shoot 4K videos. It is backed by a 3,000mAh battery. Moto G5 Plus has a fingerprint scanner embedded in the home button.
